data.name: Avoiding Confirmation Bias
data.text: Avoid confirmation bias by seeking out information that contradicts your beliefs about a particular investment. This will help you make more well-rounded and informed investment decisions.

data.name: Having Realistic Expectations
data.text: Set realistic expectations for your investments and understand that there will always be some level of risk involved. Remember that investing is a long-term game, and avoid making impulsive decisions based on short-term gains or losses.
